definition: to use/to employ/to have to/to eat or drink/expense or outlay/usefulness/hence/therefore

sentences.english: That good for nothing never sends any money to his poor mother.
sentences.chinese: 那个没用的家伙，从不给他可怜的母亲送钱。

sentences.english: It is no use to sermon me.
Stronger is useless, why not Lele eyes?
sentences.chinese: 要强既是没用，何不乐乐眼前呢？

sentences.english: Fuck, eat shit in Li Jing, immortality is useless.
sentences.chinese: 他妈的，于静丽吃屎，不死也没用。

sentences.english: It is no use raking over the past, let us look ahead to the future.
sentences.chinese: 翻老账没用，让我们向前看眼望未来吧。

sentences.english: And I never use that word.
sentences.chinese: 我也从来没用过这个词。

sentences.english: But if you have 45 or 100 people, that won't work.
sentences.chinese: 但如果你有45或者100个人，这就没用了。

sentences.english: I think it is no use .
I’ve tried nail hardeners, but they don’t seem to help.
sentences.chinese: 我试过用一些指甲硬化剂，但是没用。

sentences.english: You are useless, go kill yourself.
It's no use crying over milk.
It won't matter if the road gets slippery.
sentences.chinese: 假如路变滑了，再好也没用。

sentences.english: Talk to the audience? Ugh. This is always death.
sentences.chinese: 和听众对话？呃。这基本上没用。

sentences.english: Q. But you didn't use the slice a lot tonight.
sentences.chinese: 可你今晚没用多少削球。

sentences.english: It is seldom used as its original usage even if they have it.
sentences.chinese: 如果有也几乎没用到原来用途。

sentences.english: Toss those papers out, they are useless.
sentences.chinese: 把那些证明文件扔掉吧，没用了。

definition: there is nothing to be done/one can't do anything about it
anyway/in any case/to come over from the enemy's side
at a loss/unable to do anything about it/to have no choice
to say again/to put off a discussion until later/moreover/what's more/besides
to be indifferent/not to matter/cannot be said to be
nonsense/rubbish/superfluous words/You don't say!/No kidding! (gently sarcastic)
